channel.title: [PI] Special issue!
channel.description:
[8/16/11 10:41 AM]: master laake - actionbutton: 29138 [8/16/11 10:41 AM]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1091 [8/16/11 10:41 AM]: at server.model.players.CombatAssistant.activateSpecial( CombatAssistant.java:2972) [8/16/11 10:41 AM]: at server.model.players.CombatAssistant.attackNpc(Combat Assistant.java:253) [8/16/11 10:41 AM]: at server.model.players.packets.ClickNPC.processPacket(C lickNPC.java:107) [8/16/11 10:41 AM]: at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(Pack etHandler.java:137) [8/16/11 10:41 AM]: at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Clie nt.java:1701) [8/16/11 10:41 AM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:140) [8/16/11 10:41 AM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:177)
That is the error i get whenever i use special on any of my newly spawned npc, is there somewhere i have to add the npc code for them to react to the special?

This use to happen to me, give me the “new npc you have spawned code” and another i will fix it
